songs.title: Bank Robber
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Justin Timberlake]
Eheh, eheh
Eheh, eheh
Eheh, eheh
Listen...

[Verse 1: Justin Timberlake]
She got a mean walk, her attitude's cold
She got you beggin', waitin' - lookin' like an asshole
And now you're pullin' up your shit like a valet
You hangin' on to every little lyric she say
You bought a big rock hopin' she'd show it off
You tried to go hard but you end up lookin' soft
It took a couple stacks just to make her fall
And when you wasn't lookin' she took it all

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Timberlake]
She got her nails done red and they're sharp as a knife
Don't turn your back, cause she moves like a thief in the night
Your little plan had a (hiccup), got held up like a (stick up)
So watch it - she don't care if you're dead or alive

[Chorus: Justin Timberlake]
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
Another hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
She's just a hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go

[Hook]
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say : "I-I-I love-"

No, you don't...

[Verse 2: James Fauntleroy]
She got you bankrupt - now you're recession-proof
The IRS withholding hoes that would have sex with you
Invested your bread before you thought of it
She used them baby VVS's out your starter kit
She made the checks stop like it's a red light
It didn't take a lot - just a red light
You need a couple stacks just to make her fall
And when you wasn't looking she took it all, yeah

[Pre-Chorus : Justin Timberlake]
She got her nails done red and they're sharp as a knife
Don't turn your back, cause she moves like a thief in the night
Your little plan had a (hiccup), got held up like a (stick up)
So watch it - she don't care if you're dead or alive

[Chorus: Justin Timberlake]
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
Another hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
She's just a hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go

[Hook]
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say : "I-I-I love-"

Follow me?

[Verse 3: Justin Timberlake]
Your deal went South, maybe call Mr. West...
You need them 808s for that heartbreak up in your chest
She took your home account and she don't even care
Not even a dream couldn't save you from this nightmare
She got the swagger - a T.I. with a little Hov
And you got swaggered right out of your house and home
It's pretty painful but you can make it stop
And now you're Weezy, effed up - you got your lollipop

[Chorus: Justin Timberlake]
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
Another hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go
You're dealin' with a bank (bank, bank) robber
She's just a hustler with a hand in your pocket
Takin' off with a rocket full of dough
And there she go

[Hook x2]
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say : "I-I-I love-"

No, you don't...

I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I heard her say: "I love you, baby!"
I thought I heard her say : "I-I-I love-"

No, you don't...
